<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

    <title>Feedback Form</title>

    <style>
 body, html {
  height:100%;
  
background-repeat: no-repeat;
background-size: cover;
  	overflow-x: hidden;
	font-family: 'Dosis', sans-serif;
}
* {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

      body {
        font-family: "Poppins", sans-serif;
        
 text-align: center;
      }
      
      p {
        text-align: center;
        color: white;
      }
      header {
  background-color: #201e1e;
  color: white;
  padding: 10px 0;
  text-align: center;
}

header .contain {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 20px;
}

header h1 {
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 24px;
}

nav ul {
  list-style: none;
  display: flex;
  margin: 0;
}

nav ul li {
  margin: 0 10px;
}

nav ul li a {
  color: white;
  text-decoration: none;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  display: block;
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
}

nav ul li a:hover {
  background-color: #575757;
}

/* .header section styles */
.header {
  text-align: center;
  padding: 150px 20px;
  background-image: url('main.jpg'); /* Replace with your image path */
  background-size: cover;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  color: darksalmon;
}

.header h1 {
  font-size: 40px;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.header h4 {
  font-size: 24px;
}

      
      #Container {
        display: flex;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        justify-content: center;
      }
      .card{
                    border-radius: 16px;
                    color: black;
                    border: none;
                    width: 700px;
                    padding: 10px;
                  
                    margin: 15px ;
                    
                   
                    justify-content: center;
                }
                .card-img{
                    border-radius: 16px;
                    width: 100%;
                }
             
      button {
        background-color: black;
        color: white;
        padding: 10px;
        cursor: pointer;
        border: none;
        font-weight: bold;
      
        transition: 0.5s;
      }
      
      button:hover {
        background-color: orangered;
      }
      .checked {
  color: blueviolet;
      }

      input[type=text],input[type=date],input[type=time],input[type=number],input[list],textarea{
            padding:10px;
            margin:2px;
            border-color: black;
            border:3px solid darkblue;
            border-radius: 3ch;
            background-color: lightgray;
          }
            

            button{
            border-radius: 5cqb;
            width: 30%;
            color: antiquewhite;
            padding: 20px;
            background-color:green;
             border: none;
            color: white;
            padding: 16px 32px;
            text-decoration: none;
            margin: 4px 2px;
            cursor: pointer;
           } 
           
           label{
color: black;
           }
           
          </style>
     
    
</head>
<body>
  <header>
    <div class="contain">

      <nav>
      <ul>
      <li><a href="Index.html">Home</a></li>

      <li><a href="about.html">About Us</a></li>
      <li><a href="contact.html">Contact Us</a></li>
      </ul>
    </nav>
    </div>
  </header>

    <div id="Container">
      <div class="card">
        
   
        <form>
           
                <h2>Contact Us</h2>

        <input list="browsers" name="browser" id="browser" placeholder="Select Type"required>
        
        <datalist id="browsers">
          <option value="Support Request">
          <option value="Feedback">
        </datalist><br><br>
        
        <input type="text" id="email" name="email" placeholder="Enter Your Email"required><br>
      

        <label>Is anything you would like to see changed or improved? Please be as specific as you would like.</label><br>
        <textarea name="feedback" maxlength="1200" cols="50" rows="8"required></textarea>

        <h2>Rate Us!!</h2>
<span class="fa fa-star checked"></span>
<span class="fa fa-star checked"></span>
<span class="fa fa-star checked"></span>
<span class="fa fa-star checked"></span>
<span class="fa fa-star"></span>
<br>

        </form>
       
      </div> 
</body>

##donate.html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Donate Excess Food</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="donate.css">
</head>
<body>
    <header>
        <div class="contain">
          <h1>Home</h1>
          <nav>
          <ul>
          <li><a href="Index.html">Home</a></li>
          <li><a href="login.html">Login</a></li>
          <li><a href="donate.html">Donate</a></li>
          <li><a href="about.html">About Us</a></li>
          <li><a href="contact.html">Contact Us</a></li>
          </ul>
        </nav>
        </div>
      </header>
    <main>
        <div class="container">
            <form id="donateForm" action="process_donation.php" method="POST">
                <label for="name">Your Name:</label>
                <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required>
                
                <label for="email">Email:</label>
                <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required>
                
                <label for="phone">Phone:</label>
                <input type="tel" id="phone" name="phone">
                
                <label for="address">Address:</label>
                <textarea id="address" name="address" rows="4" required></textarea>
                
                <label for="foodDescription">Type of Food:</label>
                <textarea id="foodDescription" name="foodDescription" rows="4" required></textarea>
                
                <label for="quantity">Quantity (approx):</label>
                <input type="text" id="quantity" name="quantity" required>
                
                <button type="submit">Donate</button>
            </form>
        </div>
    </main>
</body>
</html>
